title: Akai MPK225
description:
• 25 semi-weighted, full-size keys with aftertouch
• 8 RGB-illuminated MPC-style pads each with 4 banks for 32 pads
• 12 assignable Q-Link controllers include 8 control knobs and 4 backlit buttons
• Revamped control layout with backlit LCD screen
• USB-MIDI with 5-pin MIDI input & output
• Comprehensive transport and parameter controls for hands-on DAW integration
• MPC Note Repeat and arpeggiator for advanced rhythmic and melodic manipulation
• MPC Full Level, Tap Tempo, and Time Division assist with dynamics and tempo
• Pitch bend, modulation, and octave controls
• 1 assignable footswitch jack & 1 expression jack
• USB power and plug-and-play connectivity
